description: This source file defines a servlet filter class 'AppAuthUserFilter' that intercepts HTTP requests to extract and log an authentication user ID from request headers, and manages request context.

classes.name: AppAuthUserFilter
classes.description: A servlet filter that intercepts HTTP requests to extract a user authentication ID from headers, logs it, and manages request context.

methods.name: doFilter
methods.description: Processes incoming requests by extracting the 'X-Auth-Id' header, logging it, updating request context, and then proceeding with the filter chain; also ensures cleanup of context after processing.
